name: Taste and See
description: I'll be taking you to different sights around the city of Toronto, some unbeknownst when taking regular streamlined tours. We'll go to the best known places in the city Nathan Philipps, Younge and Dundas, but i'll also take you to some other places that are a bit more low key where you can take picturesque photos and make memories to last a lifetime. We'll taste some of the best but, most budget friendly food Toronto has to offer that will satisfy even the most picky of eaters. This tour will truly be an adventure for all the senses so come Taste and See Toronto with me! The following are just a sneak peak of the places I will be taking you on your tour:
